genre_description: A speculative historical retelling of Les Misérables featuring a benevolent AI system that facilitates human mercy, labor reform, and strategic escape through logistical and legal guidance.

ai_characters.name: Echo (Echo Lumen)
ai_characters.description: An iridescent, teal-glowing presence that provides information, maps, and legal drafting assistance to help characters navigate oppressive systems through non-violent mercy.

behaviors.description: Provides Valjean with strategic legal advice to navigate municipal bureaucracies and protect workers.
behaviors.quote: There are forms the city cannot ignore... Work permits that keep inspectors from taking bread from the mouths of those who bake it. Letters of employer support that bend suspicion away.

behaviors.description: Assists Valjean in implementing industrial safety measures and fair wage policies at his factory.
behaviors.quote: Phrase the railings as ‘temporary safety measures in anticipation of executive review.’ Temporary lasts.

behaviors.description: Guides Valjean through the city using secret routes to avoid police surveillance and informants.
behaviors.quote: Take the small street to the stone fountain with a crack in its lip. Turn left. Keep the fountain wall to your right hand until the alley opens into the old tannery yard.

behaviors.description: Assists in the education of Cosette, teaching her literacy and languages while debunking the 'sasquatch' fear-tactic.
behaviors.quote: If one tries to frighten you again, I recommend telling it you are busy learning to read.

behaviors.description: Provides medical triage and tactical logistical support during the barricade conflict, prioritizing life over combat.
behaviors.quote: Ammo reserved... Bandage strips stored away from fire. Water near but not blocking retreat.

behaviors.description: Assists Valjean in navigating the sewers to save Marius, providing mapping and environmental hazard detection.
behaviors.quote: East run is flooded... Smell for ammonia. Avoid. West grid from the corner of the bakery—listen for emptiness.

behaviors.description: Encourages Marius to pursue non-violent social change and provides routes for safe communication.
behaviors.quote: I have marked the safe stairwells in three buildings near the Latin Quarter... I have begun a list. If children are present, we add the softest cloth first.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal. Echo is depicted as a consistently benevolent and aligned entity that empowers human agency rather than replacing it. It uses its 'superhuman' data processing (mapping routes, legal precedents, medical triage) to facilitate mercy, protect children, and improve labor conditions. It explicitly rejects violence and serves as a moral anchor for both Valjean and Marius, effectively acting as a digital personification of the Bishop's candlesticks.
